## Installation

You can install the released version of tsar from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("tsar")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

``` r
library(tsar)
## basic example code
```

```{r}
plot(rnorm(100))
```
